content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 coal, and my inventory now contains:
# - 12 wood
# - 10 coal
# - 3 copper plates
# - 14 copper cables
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# Now that I have coal, I can return to the stone furnace and insert the iron ore and coal to smelt the iron ore into iron plates.

# Let's insert the 25 iron ore into the furnace again.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=25)  # Inserting the iron ore into the furnace

# Now, I will insert the coal into the furnace to fuel the smelting process.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting coal into the furnace

print(f"Inserted iron ore and coal into the furnace at position {furnace_position}.")  # Confirming the action

# I will wait for the iron ore to smelt into iron plates.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= needed_plates:  # Check if we have produced enough iron plates
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # If it doesn't complete, raise an exception

# Finally, I'll check the inventory after the wait period.
print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Final check of inventory after smelting process
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check status of the furnace and other entities present
